    • Method Detail

      • hasTable

        public static boolean hasTable(Connection connection,
                               String tableName)
                        throws SQLException
        Tells whether the table tableName exists in the database, or not.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the name of the table that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the table tableName exists in the database, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while checking if the table exists

      • hasColumn

        public static boolean hasColumn(Connection connection,
                                String tableName,
                                String columnName)
                         throws SQLException
        Tells whether the table tableName has the column with the given columnName, or not.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the name of the table that may have the column
        columnName - the name of the column that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the table tableName has the column columnName, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while checking if the table has the column

      • hasIndex

        public static boolean hasIndex(Connection connection,
                               String tableName,
                               String indexName)
                        throws SQLException
        Tells whether the table tableName has an index with the given indexName, or not.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the name of the table that may have the index
        indexName - the name of the index that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the table tableName has the index indexName, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while checking if the table has the index

      • getColumnType

        public static int getColumnType(Connection connection,
                                String tableName,
                                String columnName)
                         throws SQLException
        Gets the type of the given column columnName of the table tableName.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the name of the table that has the column
        columnName - the name of the column that will be used to get the type
        Returns:
        the type of the column, or -1 if the column doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while checking the type of the column

      • getColumnSize

        public static int getColumnSize(Connection connection,
                                String tableName,
                                String columnName)
                         throws SQLException
        Gets the size of the given column columnName of the table tableName.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        tableName - the name of the table that has the column
        columnName - the name of the column that will be used to get the size
        Returns:
        the length of the column, or -1 if the column doesn't exist, or if the type has no size.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while checking the size of the column

      • executeAndClose

        public static void executeAndClose(PreparedStatement preparedStatement)
                            throws SQLException
        Executes and closes the given preparedStatement.
        Parameters:
        preparedStatement - the statement that will be executed and immediately closed
        Throws:
        SQLException - if error occurred while executing the given preparedStatement
        See Also:
        Statement.close(), PreparedStatement.execute()

        preparedStatement - the statement that will be executed and immediately closed
        Throws:
        SQLException - if error occurred while executing the given preparedStatement
        See Also:
